rdf_content.description: NuccMM has fully annotated volumes: (1) NuccMM-Z: 0.1 mm3 electron microscopy (EM) volume containing nearly the entire zebrafish brain with around 170,000 nuclei ; (2) NucMM-M: 0.25 mm3 micro-CT (uCT) volume containing part of a mouse visual cortex with about 7,000 nuclei.
rdf_content.name: NucMM
